document.full_text: novak djokovic, who has yet to lose this year, improved his clay-court credentials with a straight-set victory over rafael nadal, snapping the spaniard's 37-match winning streak on the surface.
document.title: tennis: djokovic narrows the gap with nadal
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic, who has yet to lose this year, improved his clay-court credentials with a straight-set victory over rafael nadal, snapping the spaniard's 37-match winning streak on the surface.
